game_types.name: Laser Tag
game_types.description: Fast-paced team combat with laser equipment

game_types.name: Airsoft
game_types.description: Tactical gameplay with airsoft guns and realistic scenarios

scenarios.title: Team Deathmatch
scenarios.description: Classic team vs team combat. Eliminate the enemy team to win.

scenarios.title: Capture the Flag
scenarios.description: Infiltrate enemy territory and capture their flag while defending yours.

scenarios.title: Domination
scenarios.description: Control strategic points on the map to accumulate points.

scenarios.title: VIP Escort
scenarios.description: One team protects a VIP while the other team tries to eliminate them.

scenarios.title: Infection
scenarios.description: Survivors vs infected. Tagged players join the infected team.

scenarios.title: Search and Destroy
scenarios.description: Attackers plant a bomb while defenders try to prevent it.

scenarios.title: Hostage Rescue
scenarios.description: Special forces must rescue hostages from enemy territory.

scenarios.title: Milsim Operation
scenarios.description: Military simulation with realistic tactics and communication.

scenarios.title: King of the Hill
scenarios.description: Teams fight to control a central position on the battlefield.
